name: The Street
description:
The Story

You are a businessman on a trip to an unknow town. On the way there, your car died. Since the city is not far off, you decide to walk. But what you don't know is that many people have disappeared on this street  and you will find out, why . . . 

This is my first Game i ever made, so it 's short. Please give me Feedback, i will appreciate that!

(This Game does not save!)
